description.brief: Hardware drivers for the NIFTi robots

stack.description:
Hardware drivers for the NIFTi robots The project can be found at NIFTi.
It would be good to check the dependencies, because some might be superfluous
These packages are necessary (from the ROS website): sicktoolbox, sicktoolbox_wrapper, ptu46
Benoit Larochelle modified the pioneer3dx_driver for a few tweaks, and usb_cam to add a frame_id
stack.author: Various NIFTi project partners, mostly Blue Botics and ETHZ
